articles.description: The convenience store industry debuts with a score of 76 (out of 100) in the ACSI's inaugural study. Wawa leads all chains with a score of 82.
articles.content: ANN ARBOR, Mich.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The race for convenience store superiority is tight, but Wawa comes out on top with an industry-leading score of 82 (out of 100), according to the American Customer… [+4881 chars]
